definition: to apply (paint etc)/to smear/to daub/to blot out/to scribble/to scrawl/(literary) mud/street
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me
to paint/to smear/to apply (makeup etc)/to doodle/to erase/to obliterate
muddled and completely collapsing (idiom); in an awful condition/complete shambles/a total mess
to alter (text)/to change by painting over/to correct (with correction fluid)
variant of 糊裡糊塗|糊里糊涂[hu2 li5 hu2 tu2]
variant of 糊裡糊塗|糊里糊涂[hu2 li5 hu2 tu2]
failed and wiped over the floor (idiom); to fail utterly/a crushing defeat/beaten and in a hopeless position

sentences.english: Surely applying a thin layer of antifriction when installing sleeve.
sentences.chinese: 在装轴套时，在轴上涂上一薄层减摩剂。

sentences.english: UV coated photosensitive dry roll production lines.
There is no need to reapply it for several hours which makes it also long lasting.
sentences.chinese: 持续时间很长，不需要每隔几个小时就涂一次。

sentences.english: I remember hours of acne fast right next coated, printed pox will not leave.
sentences.chinese: 下次记得痘痘快好的时分涂，就不会留下痘印了。

sentences.english: In the reflection is a paint-by-number horse.
sentences.chinese: 镜子里反射的是一张马的按数字涂颜色的画。

sentences.english: If a gate was hard to open, he oiled the latch.
sentences.chinese: 如果他遇到一扇难开的门，他就涂一些油在门闩上。

sentences.english: How did you get them iced so evenly?
sentences.chinese: 你怎么能把奶油涂这么匀呢？

sentences.english: The first printed books were made by putting ink on a wooden block and holding the paper against it.
sentences.chinese: 第一本印刷书是用纸紧贴涂有墨汁的木版制成的。

sentences.english: How about the seemingly painted-on mask?
sentences.chinese: 那个涂在脸上的面罩呢？

sentences.english: Later, I did not eat fish, but also did not give him what medicines Tu.
sentences.chinese: 后来我就没吃带鱼，也没给他涂什么药。

sentences.english: Moisten the cloth before applying the lotion.
sentences.chinese: 在涂擦洗液之前先把布弄湿。

sentences.english: Make a paste from baking soda and water and apply directly to the mosquito bite.
sentences.chinese: 把发酵粉和水搅拌成糊状，直接涂在蚊子叮咬处。

sentences.english: She smoothed suntan lotion over her arms.
sentences.chinese: 她轻轻地把防晒油涂在胳膊上。

sentences.english: She also wore a hint of red lipstick.
sentences.chinese: 那天，她还涂了少量的红色唇膏。

definition: to paint/to smear/to apply (makeup etc)/to doodle/to erase/to obliterate
to apply (ointment, powder)/to smear/to paint on
to smear/to wipe/to erase/classifier for wisps of cloud, light-beams etc
to spread/to lay out/to apply (powder, ointment etc)/sufficient (to cover)/enough
(of a woman) to adorn oneself/makeup/adornment/trousseau/stage makeup and costume
